sections.heading: 01|Proceedings for reorganization
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFWhen proceedings are pending in any court for the sale of the railroad of a railroad company, under a mortgage or deed of trust, and two thirds in interest

sections.heading: 19, inclusive, of the Revised Code apply to companies whose railroads are party within and party without this state
sections.text: A domestic company possessing such a railroad, may exercise all its powers, privileges, faculties, and franchises outside this state. A foreign corporation possessing a railroad whic
